title: 11/18/21 DPS Hour 2 Sean Payton
itunes:title: 11/18/21 DPS Hour 2 Sean Payton
description:
Sean Payton talks to Dan about an upcoming movie coming out about his year away from the league. Coach Payton says he agrees that the NFL can afford full time referees.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
